A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst star wars movie to date\, and it comes from someone who watched the disgrace called the phantom menace\, which\, even with all the bullshit it had\, still managed to move the plot and the lore forward. Here there is absolute nothing. Odd decisions\, cheap deaths that look more like actors contract terminations that plot planing\, huge amounts of plot holes\, unnecessary and stretched segments. Just a horrible movie overall that if not for being named star wars would be destroyed by the critic.
